extension.name: ANGLE_instanced_arrays

contributors.contributor: Members of the WebGL working group

mirrors.name: ANGLE_instanced_arrays
mirrors.addendum: The implementation must validate the indices referenced by drawArraysInstancedANGLE and drawElementsInstancedANGLE similarly to how indices referenced by drawArrays and drawElements are validated according to section Enabled Vertex Attributes and Range Checking of the WebGL specification.

overview.p: Although the extension contains ANGLE in the name it may be exposed by any implementation, whether or not the implementation uses the ANGLE library.

revision.change: Renumbered to 19 to fix misnumbering problem.
